title: American Airlines and US Airways - key figures 2015
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unnamed: 1 for 7 number of Key areas.
The Unnamed: 1 is highest at Key area Available seat kilometres (in millions) and lowest at Key area Number of countries served.
The difference of Unnamed: 1 between the highest and lowest Key area is 427478.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unnamed: 1 for 7 number of Key areas.
Key area Available seat kilometres (in millions) has the highest Unnamed: 1 and Number of countries served has the lowest Unnamed: 1.

Unnamed: 1 at Key area Available seat kilometres (in millions) is 427533.0 , second place is Revenue passenger kilometers (in millions) at 350627.0, and thirdly is Number of daily departures at 6985.0.
Considered together, the average Unnamed: 1 in all 7 Key areas is roughly 112432.61.
